problem: 如图,△ABC中,AB,AC的垂直平分线分别交BC于D,E,若∠BAC=110°,则∠DAE的度数为()
answer: ∵∠BAC=120°,∴∠B+∠C=60°,.边AB和AC的垂直平分线分别交BC于D、E,∴DA=DB,EA=EC,∴∠DAB=∠B,∠EAC=∠C,∴∠DAE=∠BAC-(∠BAD+∠EAC)=∠BAC-(∠B+∠C)=40°,故选A.
comment: 本题考查的是线段垂直平分线的性质,掌握线段的垂直平分线上的点到线段的两个端点的距离相等是解题的关键
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the perpendicular bisectors of AB and AC in △ABC intersect BC at D and E respectively. If ∠BAC = N_0, then the degree of ∠DAE is ()
